content.query:
--select * from sys.external_tables

if EXISTS (Select * from sys.external_tables where name='employeeET')
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE "employeeET"

if NOT EXISTS(Select * from sys.external_tables where name='employeeET')
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[employeeET]
(
	 [Id] INT,
	 [Fullname] VARCHAR(1000),
	 [Salary] INT,
	 [Age] INT
)
WITH
(
	LOCATION = '/employee/master',
	DATA_SOURCE = [DS1],
	FILE_FORMAT = [CsvFormat2]
)
GO
